content: to join simply use the buttonholes to sew the claws securely onto the bottom of each talon - ref figs 30 & 31 the glasses are also dolls accessories - mine are simply perched on top of wol s beak - the handles ends are poked into the side of his head - ref fig 32 fig 32 fig 30 fig 31 remember to get in touch if you need a little extra advice and of course there is more much more to learn create and be inspired by here @dotpebbles_knits please also remember that this pattern like all of my patterns is copyrighted this prohibits copying or reproducing any of its writing content for your own profit however if you want to sell what you ve made from any of my patterns then that is perfectly fine and please do share what you ve created from this pattern and look out for my other pooh bear patterns #dotpebbles_knits #dotpebblescreatureland x
